products.title: Burlington, Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: In a soft dove grey, the burlington shadow offers subtle style, with its solid, strong fabric and pretty abstract patterning. The vertical sheets hang neatly, able to be pulled across or tilted according to your light and privacy needs. Use the shadow as part of a grey and white colour scheme, which gives understated style and a fresh, airy look, perfect for a guest bedroom or home office. Go for clean, contemporary furniture to keep the feel modern and welcoming.

products.title: Grande, Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: Fashion an elegant dcor scheme with the grande shadow, where exquisite silky threads merge to parade a creative and captivating display of textured waves. This attractive blind also flaunts a calming, seafoam hue with a contemporary grey tinge. It is perfectly suited to many surroundings, and furthermore, contains adjustable slats to allow the desired amount of ventilation and privacy. Create a sophisticated dining area by matching the shadow with a soothing colour palette of whites, olives, and avocados.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave. Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Shadows
products.description: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Shadow Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: This shadow grey perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Birdsong, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look that will never grow old. Match birdsong shadow with some simple country touches like a light beige rug on a wooden floor and a hessian canvas on the wall to create the homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral.
